dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, big news out of Central Asia this week, right? The second Central Asia-China summit just wrapped up in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, big news out of Central Asia this week, right? The second Central Asia-China summit just wrapped up in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The second Central Asia " China summit was held in Astana, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. President Tokayev of Kazakhstan, um, he really kicked things off by thanking President Xi for his firm commitment to cooperation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. President Tokayev of Kazakhstan, um, he really kicked things off by thanking President Xi for his firm commitment to cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev began his opening remarks by thanking Chinese President Xi Jinping for his firm commitment to comprehensive cooperation with the countries of Central Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And not just Xi, but also, like, the other Central Asian leaders for, you know, being so involved and supportive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And not just Xi, but also, like, the other Central Asian leaders for, you know, being so involved and supportive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev also expressed appreciation to the leaders of the brotherly Central Asian nations for their active engagement in the summit and consistent support for regional cooperation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I saw a quote where Tokayev basically said Kazakhstan has found an "eternal partner and true friend" in China. Pretty strong words!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I saw a quote where Tokayev basically said Kazakhstan has found an eternal partner and true friend in China. Pretty strong words!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev on China: Kazakhstan has found an eternal partner and true friend

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, "eternal partner." That's, uh, quite a declaration. He also praised Xi's initiative for a "community with a shared future," focusing on equal partnership and respect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, eternal partner. That's, uh, quite a declaration. He also praised Xi's initiative for a community with a shared future, focusing on equal partnership and respect.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He praised Xi Jinping™s initiative to create a "community with a shared future for neighboring countries," highlighting that it aligns with the principles of equal partnership, mutual benefit, and respect.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, that resonated. And after all the speeches, they actually signed the Astana Declaration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, that resonated. And after all the speeches, they actually signed the Astana Declaration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following the summit, the heads of state signed the Astana Declaration of the second Central Asia " China summit...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, and a pretty significant treaty too, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and a pretty significant treaty too, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...as well as a treaty on eternal good-neighborliness, friendship, and cooperation between the Republic of Kazakhstan, the Kyrgyz Republic, the Republic of Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, the Republic of Uzbekistan, and the People™s Republic of China, stated the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, a treaty on "eternal good-neighborliness, friendship, and cooperation" between all the participating nations. That's a mouthful, but, uh, sounds important.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, a treaty on eternal good-neighborliness, friendship, and cooperation between all the participating nations. That's a mouthful, but, uh, sounds important.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...as well as a treaty on eternal good-neighborliness, friendship, and cooperation between the Republic of Kazakhstan, the Kyrgyz Republic, the Republic of Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, the Republic of Uzbekistan, and the People™s Republic of China, stated the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Super important, I think, for regional stability and future ties. Before all that, Tokayev even welcomed everyone at the Palace of Independence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super important, I think, for regional stability and future ties. Before all that, Tokayev even welcomed everyone at the Palace of Independence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Before the official meeting, President Tokayev welcomed the participating leaders at the Palace of Independence and took a joint photo with them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, classic joint photo op, you know, setting the stage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, classic joint photo op, you know, setting the stage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Before the official meeting, President Tokayev welcomed the participating leaders at the Palace of Independence and took a joint photo with them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And Xi Jinping, um, he was actually there for a two-day state visit, right? Tokayev invited him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Xi Jinping, um, he was actually there for a two-day state visit, right? Tokayev invited him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, President Xi Jinping arrived in Kazakhstan on June 16 for a two-day state visit at the invitation of President Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's right. They had bilateral talks too. Tokayev made a point of saying Xi is always a "highly respected guest" on Kazakh soil.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right. They had bilateral talks too. Tokayev made a point of saying Xi is always a highly respected guest on Kazakh soil.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the same day, the two leaders held bilateral talks. President Tokayev emphasized that President Xi is always a highly respected guest on Kazakh soil...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which really underscores, like, the sincere and unwavering friendship between the two countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which really underscores, like, the sincere and unwavering friendship between the two countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and his visit stands as a vivid symbol of the sincere and unwavering friendship between the two nations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's, uh, a clear sign of strengthening ties in that whole region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's, uh, a clear sign of strengthening ties in that whole region.
